Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2008 07:26PM smehr wrote: I had a bilateral mastectomy 2 weeks ago and for the last week or so have had a lot of pain right over my sternum between where my breasts used to be.  Neither my surgeon nor my oncologist can tell me what is causing this or how long it's expected to last.  I'm due to have Chemotherapy in one and a half weeks from now and am concerned about this pain on top of the Chemotherapy.   Any suggestions or help would be appreciated.
Posts.Title: Breastbone pain after lumpectomy-anyone else? bluewillow smehr
